main event: An observer reported seeing a UFO in Auburn, Pennsylvania on March 10, 1967, described as a green light moving left.
interesting points: The observer noted the object had the same brightness and size as the sun., The sighting lasted approximately 1-2 minutes and was visually clear., The object was reported to move in a dashed line before disappearing., The object was described as having a chrome color and mute sound., The observer was located outdoors during the sighting.
sighted object: a green light in the sky
